The purpose study characterize pharmacokinetics GSK1278863 metabolites subject end stage renal disease ( ESRD ) undergo peritoneal dialysis . This repeat-dose , open-label , parallel-group study . Approximately 30 subject ESRD enrol two cohort ( 15 subject cohort ) ensure 6 subject continuous ambulatory peritoneal dialysis ( CAPD ) ( cohort 1 ) 6 subject automate peritoneal dialysis APD ( cohort 2 ) complete dose critical assessment . GSK1278863 administer daily 14 day . Primary pharmacokinetic assessment make Days 1 14 .
